CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnUpdate
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if self.isVisible == true then local itemEntity = _EntityService:GetEntity("2e25c904-3cab-4c4b-917e-4bc4701cc8ab") itemEntity:SetVisible(true, true) end if (self.isEnable == true and self.justOneTime == false) then local itemEntity = _EntityService:GetEntity("2e25c904-3cab-4c4b-917e-4bc4701cc8ab") itemEntity:SetEnable(true, true) self.justOneTime = true end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTouchEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters -------------------------------------------------------- self.isVisible = true log("Item Visible") self.isEnable = true log("Item Enable")
